statements.select:
SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY AA.ID DESC) AS RowNo , AA.ID , AA.CreatedOn , AA.CreatedBy , AA.CreatedByName , AA.UpdatedOn , AA.UpdatedBy , AA.UpdatedByName
, AA.Name , AA.Code , AA.ChannelType , AA.Description , AA.DescriptionRTF , AA.UseYn , AA.ImageID
, M1.Name as ChannelTypeName
FROM dbo.TChannel AA WITH (NOLOCK) LEFT JOIN IKBase.dbo.TCode M1 WITH (NOLOCK) ON AA.ChannelType = M1.Code AND M1.ParentCode = 'ChannelType' WHERE 1=1
AND AA.ChannelType = #ChannelType#
AND AA.UseYn = #UseYn#
AND ( AA.Name LIKE '%' + #FindText# + '%' OR AA.Code LIKE '%' + #FindText# + '%' )
ORDER BY RowNo
SELECT * FROM dbo.TChannel AA WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE AA.ID = #ID#
statements.insert:
INSERT INTO dbo.TChannel ( CreatedOn, CreatedBy, CreatedByName, Name, Code, ChannelType, Description, DescriptionRTF, UseYn, ImageID ) VALUES ( GetDate(), #CreatedBy#, #CreatedByName#, #Name#, #Code#, #ChannelType#, #Description#, #DescriptionRTF#, #UseYn#, #ImageID# )
SELECT @@IDENTITY AS ID
statements.update:
UPDATE dbo.TChannel SET UpdatedOn = GetDate() , UpdatedBy = #UpdatedBy# , UpdatedByName = #UpdatedByName#
, Name = #Name# , Code = #Code# , ChannelType = #ChannelType# , Description = #Description# , DescriptionRTF = #DescriptionRTF# , UseYn = #UseYn# , ImageID = #ImageID# WHERE ID = #ID#
